name: Fake Call Troll Face Joke
description:
Fake Call Troll Face Joke
This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true Troll Face Call.
False Call Troll Face Joke - a joke is a game application where you can make it appear as if calling you Troll Face! Frightened friends, including fake Troll Face Up and show a friend, he will be very surprised!
The reaction at all different, someone is afraid, and who laugh!
Check what the reaction will have your friends and acquaintances!
Raffle close, let think that calling a terrible Troll Face!
In the game you can choose many different types of callers to call!
A real blast and a voice straight out of the tube! Check this!
ATTENTION! This is not a real call and only an imitation! The app does not bear any harm and is only for fun and jokes!
Thank you for playing with us leave us your feedback and assessment, and we'll make our game even more interesting!
